sourcesContent:
<form (ngSubmit)="onSubmit()">
    <label for="title">Title</label>
    <input type="text" id="title" [(ngModel)]="movie.title" name="title" required>
  
    <label for="genre">Genre</label>
    <input type="text" id="genre" [(ngModel)]="movie.genre" name="genre" required>
  
    <label for="releaseYear">Release Year</label>
    <input type="number" id="releaseYear" [(ngModel)]="movie.releaseYear" name="releaseYear" required>
  
    <label for="director">Director</label>
    <input type="text" id="director" [(ngModel)]="movie.director" name="director" required>
  
    <label for="image">Image URL</label>
    <input type="text" id="image" [(ngModel)]="movie.image" name="image">
  
    <label for="description">Description</label>
    <textarea id="description" [(ngModel)]="movie.description" name="description" required></textarea>
  
    <label for="watched">Watched</label>
    <input type="checkbox" id="watched" [(ngModel)]="movie.watched" name="watched">
  
    <button type="submit">Add Movie</button>
  </form>
